EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) used for processing copper ore into copper plates.

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5) used for submitting Automation Science Packs for research.
- Boiler at position (x=-10.5, y=18.0), rotated to Direction.UP, used to generate steam by heating water.
- Steam Engine at position (x=-10.5, y=22.5) used to convert steam into electrical power.
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5) used for supplying water to the Boiler.
- Small Electric Pole at position (x=-7.5, y=15.5) for distributing generated power to the Lab.
- Pipe Network connecting the Boiler and Steam Engine (e.g. fluid_system=10, with a representative segment near position (x=-12.5, y=19.5)).
- Pipe Network connecting the Offshore Pump to the Boiler (e.g. fluid_system=37, with a representative segment near position (x=-8.5, y=20.5)).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- Crafting and Sub-ingredient Dependencies:
  • Always verify that all base resources (e.g. iron plates) and intermediary items (e.g. iron-gear-wheels) are available before initiating the crafting of advanced items like steam engines.

- Entity Placement and Spacing:
  • Before placing a new entity, check that the target location is unoccupied; adjust spacing, direction, or reference positions to avoid collisions with existing structures (for example, a stone-furnace obstructed the boiler placement).

- Undefined Entity References:
  • Confirm that all placed entities are correctly assigned to variables (e.g. ensure that references like placed_boiler and placed_steam_engine are defined) before using them in subsequent operations such as inserting fuel or connecting components.

- Insufficient Resource Allocation for Connections:
  • Verify inventory counts and craft necessary items before connecting networks; ensure sufficient pipes are available to complete pipe connections between entities (as errors indicated shortages when 13 or 14 pipes were required).
